alopecia_oil.description: Powerful Ayurvedic blend of 17 rare herbs with black castor oil. Treats chronic alopecia and fills bald spots in 6-8 weeks. Visible results from week 3.

jojoba_oil.name: Pure Organic Jojoba Oil
jojoba_oil.description: 100% organic jojoba oil that deeply moisturizes and protects dry hair. Perfect for curly and Afro hair. Reduces frizz and adds natural shine.

sudanese_karkar.name: Authentic Sudanese Karkar
sudanese_karkar.description: Traditional Sudanese recipe made from animal butter and healing herbs. Deeply nourishes the scalp and stimulates new hair growth. The secret behind our grandmothers’ thick hair.

henna_mask.name: Nourishing Henna Hair Mask
